question.title: Invalid Tweets
question.sampleTestCase: {"headers":{"Tweets":["tweet_id","content"]},"rows":{"Tweets":[[1,"Vote for Biden"],[2,"Let us make America great again!"]]}}
mysqlSchemas: Create table If Not Exists Tweets(tweet_id int, content varchar(50))
insert into Tweets (tweet_id, content) values ('1', 'Vote for Biden')
insert into Tweets (tweet_id, content) values ('2', 'Let us make America great again!')
question.exampleTestcases: {"headers":{"Tweets":["tweet_id","content"]},"rows":{"Tweets":[[1,"Vote for Biden"],[2,"Let us make America great again!"]]}}
